author: glasser
msg: Let "PARALLEL=1 make check" run the Python tests in parallel.
(check): Pass --parallel to run_tests.py if $PARALLEL is set.

author: glasser
msg: When running a single test file, we have already changed to its directory,
so run it with ./foo_tests.py instead of relative to $SCRIPTDIR (which

author: djames
msg: * log.py (date_to_human_date): Remove unused function obsoleted by r24978.

author: djames
msg: Update ClientSession.log to save log entries in a friendly LogEntry object
instead of a tuple. This object-oriented interface is more extensible
because we can add new fields to the LogEntry object without requiring
users to change their code which works with ClientSession.log.
(_LogMessageReceiver.receive): Save log entries in a LogEntry object instead
* log.py: Update to reflect changes to ClientSession.log.

author: hwright
msg: (audit-log): Add a note about the existence of the merge-sensitive-log branch.
